name: Lux Eterna (Split Screen Controller Racing)
description: Credit goes to all four members of the group. Group University project I was involved in, I was responsible for all the programming of this project. Aim of the game is to hit way points, players can fire projectiles at each other, additionally avid red cuboids as these will kill your vehicle player, aim for the purple boxes on pyramids to win rounds. Player one will need to use keyboard and mouse, other players will need to use controllers, hope you enjoy!
